overview_summary: The adjacent organizations include a small private real estate holding LLC and a county government trustee. PRS Properties LLC appears to be a minor land investor with no public profile or known stance, likely interested only in property value. Madison County Trustee is a government entity holding a tax-delinquent parcel with no independent agenda, posing little risk of active opposition or support.

neighbors.name: PRS Properties LLC
neighbors.claims: PRS Properties LLC is a privately-held Illinois property holding company with minimal public information available; it is not listed among known local businesses in Roxana ([www.manta.com](https://www.manta.com/mb_51_ALL_4YZ/roxana_il?pg=3#:~:text=Companies%20%7C%20Roxana%2C%20IL%20,under%20Companies%20in%20Roxana%2C%20IL)). No records of financing statements, litigation, or development activity involving PRS Properties LLC were found in public databases or news archives ([propertyvendors.com](https://propertyvendors.com/realtors-brokers/il/madison-county/roxana/#:~:text=%E2%86%90%20Back%20to%20all%20Real,%2A)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Small private landowner with no known community role or political connections

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the LLC’s owner discreetly (identity not public) and emphasize how the project could enhance their property’s value or rental appeal; address any financial concerns to preempt opposition, but significant pushback is unlikely given their purely economic interest

neighbors.name: Madison County Trustee
neighbors.claims: Madison County Trustee holds title to parcel 19-2-08-34-12-204-014, a 35.3 × 120 ft lot at 152 E. 8th St. (Roxana/Wood River area), acquired by the county due to unpaid taxes ([www.scribd.com](https://www.scribd.com/document/691260247/Madison-County-Surplus-Property-1#:~:text=1223126%2019,X%20120%20IRR%20MINIMUM%20BID)). This tax-foreclosed property is slated for resale through the county’s Surplus Property Auction process, which sells land where property taxes went unpaid ([www.thetelegraph.com](https://www.thetelegraph.com/news/article/madison-county-recoups-losses-annual-real-estate-18544660.php#:~:text=The%20just,to%20pay%20the%20delinquent%20taxes)).
neighbors.influence_justification: County-held delinquent parcel with no private owner; essentially a passive government role

approach_recommendations.engage: No direct engagement necessary, as the Trustee is an administrative holder of the property; coordinate with county officials if acquisition or site access is needed, but expect no opposition since the county welcomes returning the land to productive use
